assessment.name: Mid-year Portfolio Review
assessment.weight: Compliance Hurdle: Students must complete regardless of other outcomes

assessment.name: Institute of Health Improvement online modules
assessment.weight: Compliance Hurdle: Students must complete regardless of overall course outcomes

assessment.name: Summative Portfolio Review
assessment.weight: Performance Hurdle: Students must pass regardless of other outcomes

assessment.name: Clinical Participation Assessment (CPA)
assessment.weight: Performance hurdle.  Students must meet this criterion regardless of the overall course marks.

assessment.name: Semester Task Review
assessment.weight: Contributes to Mid-year and Summative Portfolio Review

assessment.name: Semester Task Plan
assessment.weight: Contributes to Mid-year and Summative Portfolio Review

assessment.name: DOPS & COPS
assessment.weight: Submit prescribed number per semester to avoid showing insufficient progress in WLP

assessment.name: Mini-Clinical Evaluation Exercise (Mini-CEX)
assessment.weight: Submit prescribed number per semester to avoid showing insufficient progress in WLP
